ë± ì„ íƒ íŒ¨ë“œì— ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ í´ë¦½ì„ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ìœ„í•´ í† ê¸€ ë²„íŠ¼ì„ í´ë¦­í•´ ì£¼ì„¸ìš”. ìŒì•… ë§Œë“¤ê¸° Press the pads in the right time to make the music! Play with style Swipe the pad up, down, left, right. It will make different sounds. Loop sounds You can loop the sound by holding the pad. Play more beautifully Toggle the auto pattern to make the pads light with patterns. Get control of the app Tap the action button to get information, change settings & more. Check out more information Know about the artist, app itself & more. Learn how to play Check out the tutorial to learn the preset. Change now playing preset Discover different presets and its artists. CLOSE

UPDATE NO THANKS Loading preset store

RETRY @string/dialog_cancel About gesture presets
This preset is available in gesture mode.\n Gesture mode enables to swipe the pad in 4 directions to make more sounds.
Corrupted preset
This preset is corrupted and needs repair to play. Repairing the preset will remove the preset and download it again.
